TopicTitle: New Feature Videos Starting this Winter

Articles.Content: I am assuming that their will be more feature videos soon. Hopefully within the next 2 months.

3 minutes ago, PlutoISaPlanet said:

I am assuming that their will be more feature videos soon. Hopefully within the next 2 months.

???

We already get small updates every other week though? And two months from now is the start of Summer? Pretty sure when the time comes it's clear Intercept is going to be busting out the big guns, advertising-wise. I doubt you're gonna see a featured video again.

1 minute ago, Wubslin said:

???

We already get small updates every other week though? And two months from now is the start of Summer? Pretty sure when the time comes it's clear Intercept is going to be busting out the big guns, advertising-wise. I doubt you're gonna see a featured video again.

I think they have given great updates, I am just wondering what the deal is with them. When they delayed the game they said they would have more feature videos to make 2021 go by a little quicker.

Just now, PlutoISaPlanet said:

I think they have given great updates, I am just wondering what the deal is with them. When they delayed the game they said they would have more feature videos to make 2021 go by a little quicker.

Whoever said that was probably talking about the semi-weekly show and tell videos. And they are making 2021 go by easier. Is that really not enough for you?

Just now, Wubslin said:

Whoever said that was probably talking about the semi-weekly show and tell videos. And they are making 2021 go by easier. Is that really not enough for you?

All I am saying is that they said their would be more. I am fine with Friday updates. I am just pointing out what they said.

On 11/5/2020 at 12:17 PM, UomoCapra said:

 

In the meantime, we’ll keep posting cool images here to give you a taste of what’s in store. We will also
continue to release feature videos and developer diaries that go more in-depth on specific areas of the
game, and hopefully those will help 2021 to go by a little faster. Stay tuned for a new dev diary coming
soon, as well as a new Feature Video this winter.

Thanks as always for sharing our commitment to making KSP2 as great as we all know it has to be.

-Nate Simpson
I am a XFL fan. We barely get updates, barely. I will probably have to wait till 2023 for the XFL to play, longer then we will wait for KSP 2.
